body:
Hi guys,

I have been banned a month ago by my stupid brother. He calls wout200 and yeah he advertised. But thats not the reason that i am blogging the reason is a question that i wanna ask. How long does it take to get urban on avicus for advertising. I also wanna say sorry to all the guys that i have team killed on the walls hope you guys accept my apologizes.

Koning_van_psy

title: How Long?

replies.body: This isnt the place to appeal for your ban. Please do so at support@avicus.net
replies.body_tagged: This isnt the place to appeal for your ban. Please do so at support@avicus.net

replies.body:
This is not the place to appeal your infraction....
It will take up to 2 weeks to get a reply for your appeal if you receive no response in this time feel free to send it again.

Please send your appeal it:Support@avicus.net
